name: Slime and Seek
description:
Welcome to slime and seek, you play as papa slime and must traverse through the forest to find your hidden children.

GMTK 2021 Game Jam Submission made by:

Benjamin Emdon - Design (https://twitter.com/BenjaminEmdon)

Ben Hardy- Art (https://twitter.com/bens3Dcreations)

Luke Ryan - Programmer (https://twitter.com/LukeRyan589281)

Izzy Raymond - Audio (https://soundcloud.com/kineko-1)

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Q/E - Camera
